channel.title: How to make a ranged weapon?
channel.description:
I've just finished adding in a cannon into my client with working animations and everything ... but ...
Now i need to make it into a ranged weapon, that uses cannonballs for ammo. Can anyone tell me how to do this? thx

item.title: How to make a ranged weapon?
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

hand cannon lolz, I’m nowhere near good enough to add in real cannon

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a ranged weapon?
